title: Why can not  charge batteryï¼Ÿ
answer:
1) Make sure the AC charger stand is plugged properly in the Cordless Phone
2) Make sure the AC charger stand is plugged properly in the electrical outlet.
3) Make sure the battery not a failed battery.
4) Can the cordless Phone be charged by connected to the electrical outlet directly, can it be charged by the charger stand which is connected with the electrical outlet.
